revision.comment: convert {{wikipedia}} to new syntax; convert {{wikipedia}} to {{wp}}
revision.text:
The table below lists English words that have irregular plurals.
== Rules == Not included are words that follow any of the following rules:
#Words that add ''-s'', which are regular plurals #Words that end in ''-ch'', ''-o'', ''-s'', ''-sh'', ''-x'', ''-z'' #Symbols or letters, which often add ''-'s'' #Words that are invariant in the plural (''eg'', '''[[deer]]''', '''[[series]]'''), including ... [truncated]
